title: CL0P-Linked Hackers Breach Dozens of Organizations Through Oracle Software Flaw
description: Dozens of organizations may have been impacted following the zero-day exploitation of a security flaw in Oracle's E-Business Suite (EBS) software since August 9, 2025, Google Threat Intelligence Group (GTIG) and Mandiant said in a new report released Thursday. "We're still assessing the scope of this incident, but we believe it affected dozens of organizations," John Hultquist, chief analyst of
